title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Seven Pt. One
itunes:title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Seven Pt. One
description:
Mooti’s spiritual troubles intensify, Ongenagama reveals hidden depths, and the pair encounter a mischievous monkey in this week’s abbreviated episode of The Cub and the Caterpillar: A Wagadu Tale! We will return with a bonus stream next Wednesday to finish Episode Seven.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for access to our post-show discussion, The Wagadu Watch, Bonus Episodes and your Shirefolk Shoutout.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
